EmailTemplate.subject: ExxonMobil - Here is the information you requested
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I received your request for additional information on our savings4members™ ExxonMobil Fleet card program. Please take a few minutes to look through the accompanying information. Whether you fuel a few or a fleet, ExxonMobil has the card that's right for your business.
Enjoy enhanced security features including custom prompts and single station card options Potentially reduce unwanted spending through purchase restrictions you create and the ability to monitor all driver purchases and vehicle efficiencies Reduce administrative time by eliminating the need to collect paper receipts and expense reports Reduce monthly fuel usage — with automatic pump shut off capabilities See driver spending habits that may be costing you money with downloadable reports Manage your account online in real time: set purchase restrictions, update card and driver information, pay your invoice and more Avoid late fees with pay-by-phone services if a last minute payment becomes necessary Request tax-exempt reporting and billing
It’s easy to enroll. Simply complete the attached application form and fax it back to me at {!User.Fax} or scan and email it to me at {!User.Email}.
Thank you for your interest in the ExxonMobil Fleet card program.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} Fax - {!User.Fax} {!User.Email}
